    • @unchainedshop/core-products
    • configureProductsModule

    Function configureProductsModule

    • configureProductsModule(
          __namedParameters: ModuleInput<ProductsSettingsOptions>,
      ): Promise<
          {
              assignments: {
                  addProxyAssignment: (
                      __namedParameters: {
                          productId: string;
                          proxyId: string;
                          vectors: ProductConfiguration[];
                      },
                  ) => Promise<boolean>;
                  removeAssignment: (
                      productId: string,
                      __namedParameters: { vectors: ProductConfiguration[] },
                  ) => Promise<number>;
              };
              bundleItems: {
                  addBundleItem: (
                      productId: string,
                      doc: ProductBundleItem,
                  ) => Promise<string>;
                  removeBundleItem: (
                      productId: string,
                      index: number,
                  ) => Promise<ProductBundleItem>;
              };
              count: (query: ProductQuery) => Promise<number>;
              create: (__namedParameters: Product) => Promise<Product>;
              delete: (productId: string) => Promise<number>;
              deleteProductPermanently: (
                  __namedParameters: { productId: string },
                  options?: { keepReviews: boolean },
              ) => Promise<number>;
              findProduct: (
                  __namedParameters: { productId?: string; sku?: string; slug?: string },
              ) => Promise<Product>;
              findProductIds: (query: ProductQuery) => Promise<string[]>;
              findProducts: (
                  __namedParameters: ProductQuery & {
                      limit?: number;
                      offset?: number;
                      sort?: SortOption[];
                  },
                  options?: FindOptions,
              ) => Promise<Product[]>;
              firstActiveProductBundle: (productId: string) => Promise<Product>;
              firstActiveProductProxy: (productId: string) => Promise<Product>;
              isActive: (product: Product) => boolean;
              isDraft: (product: Product) => boolean;
              media: {
                  create: (
                      __namedParameters: Omit<ProductMedia, "sortKey" | "tags"> & Partial<
                          Pick<ProductMedia, "sortKey" | "tags">,
                      >,
                  ) => Promise<ProductMedia>;
                  delete: (productMediaId: string) => Promise<number>;
                  deleteMediaFiles: (
                      __namedParameters: {
                          excludedProductIds?: string[];
                          excludedProductMediaIds?: string[];
                          productId?: string;
                      },
                  ) => Promise<number>;
                  findProductMedia: (
                      __namedParameters: { productMediaId: string },
                  ) => Promise<ProductMedia>;
                  findProductMedias: (
                      __namedParameters: {
                          limit?: number;
                          offset?: number;
                          productId?: any;
                          tags?: string[];
                      },
                      options?: FindOptions<ProductMedia>,
                  ) => Promise<ProductMedia[]>;
                  texts: {
                      findLocalizedMediaText: (
                          __namedParameters: { locale: Locale; productMediaId: string },
                      ) => Promise<ProductMediaText>;
                      findMediaTexts: (
                          __namedParameters: mongodb.Filter<ProductMediaText>,
                          options?: FindOptions,
                      ) => Promise<ProductMediaText[]>;
                      updateMediaTexts: (
                          productMediaId: string,
                          texts: Omit<ProductMediaText, "productMediaId">[],
                      ) => Promise<ProductMediaText[]>;
                  };
                  update: (
                      productMediaId: string,
                      doc: Partial<ProductMedia>,
                  ) => Promise<ProductMedia>;
                  updateManualOrder: (
                      __namedParameters: {
                          sortKeys: { productMediaId: string; sortKey: number }[];
                      },
                  ) => Promise<ProductMedia[]>;
              };
              normalizedStatus: (product: Product) => ProductStatus;
              prices: {
                  catalogPriceRange: (
                      product: Product,
                      __namedParameters: {
                          countryCode: string;
                          currencyCode: string;
                          includeInactive?: boolean;
                          quantity?: number;
                          vectors: ProductConfiguration[];
                      },
                  ) => Promise<ProductPriceRange>;
                  catalogPricesLeveled: (
                      product: Product,
                      __namedParameters: { countryCode: string; currencyCode: string },
                  ) => Promise<
                      { maxQuantity: number; minQuantity: number; price: ProductPrice }[],
                  >;
                  price: (
                      product: Product,
                      __namedParameters: {
                          countryCode: string;
                          currencyCode?: string;
                          quantity?: number;
                      },
                  ) => Promise<ProductPrice>;
                  priceRange: (
                      params: { prices: ProductPrice[]; productId: string },
                  ) => { maxPrice: ProductPrice; minPrice: ProductPrice };
                  rates: {
                      getRate: (
                          baseCurrency: { decimals?: number; isoCode: string },
                          quoteCurrency: { decimals?: number; isoCode: string },
                          referenceDate?: Date,
                      ) => Promise<{ expiresAt: Date; rate: number }>;
                      getRateRange: (
                          baseCurrency: { decimals?: number; isoCode: string },
                          quoteCurrency: { decimals?: number; isoCode: string },
                          referenceDate?: Date,
                      ) => Promise<{ max: number; min: number }>;
                      updateRates: (rates: ProductPriceRate[]) => Promise<boolean>;
                  };
                  catalogPrices(product: Product): Promise<ProductPrice[]>;
              };
              productExists: (
                  __namedParameters: { productId?: string; slug?: string },
              ) => Promise<boolean>;
              proxyAssignments: (
                  product: Product,
                  __namedParameters?: { includeInactive?: boolean },
              ) => Promise<{ assignment: ProductAssignment; product: Product }[]>;
              proxyProducts: (
                  product: Product,
                  vectors?: ProductConfiguration[],
                  __namedParameters?: { includeInactive?: boolean },
              ) => Promise<Product[]>;
              publish: (product: Product) => Promise<boolean>;
              resolveOrderableProduct: (
                  product: Product,
                  __namedParameters: { configuration?: ProductConfiguration[] },
              ) => Promise<Product>;
              reviews: {
                  count: (query: ProductReviewQuery) => Promise<number>;
                  create: (doc: ProductReview) => Promise<ProductReview>;
                  delete: (productReviewId: string) => Promise<number>;
                  deleteMany: (selector: mongodb.Filter<ProductReview>) => Promise<number>;
                  findProductReview: (
                      __namedParameters: { productReviewId: string },
                  ) => Promise<ProductReview>;
                  findProductReviews: (
                      __namedParameters: ProductReviewQuery & {
                          limit?: number;
                          offset?: number;
                          sort?: SortOption[];
                      },
                  ) => Promise<ProductReview[]>;
                  reviewExists: (
                      __namedParameters: { productReviewId: string },
                  ) => Promise<boolean>;
                  update: (
                      productReviewId: string,
                      doc: Partial<ProductReview>,
                  ) => Promise<ProductReview>;
                  votes: {
                      addVote: (
                          productReview: ProductReview,
                          __namedParameters: ProductVote,
                      ) => Promise<ProductReview>;
                      ownVotes: (
                          productReview: ProductReview,
                          __namedParameters: { userId: string },
                      ) => ProductVote[];
                      removeVote: (
                          productReviewId: string,
                          __namedParameters: ProductVote,
                      ) => Promise<WithId<ProductReview>>;
                      userIdsThatVoted: (
                          productReview: ProductReview,
                          __namedParameters: { type: ProductReviewVoteType },
                      ) => string[];
                  };
              };
              search: {
                  buildActiveDraftStatusFilter: () => mongodb.Filter<Product>;
                  buildActiveStatusFilter: () => mongodb.Filter<Product>;
                  countFilteredProducts: (
                      __namedParameters: {
                          productIds: string[];

                  ) => Promise<number>;
                  findFilteredProducts: (
                      __namedParameters: {

                      },
                  ) => Promise<Product[]>;

                      },
                  ) => Promise<number>;
                  findLocalizedText: (
                      __namedParameters: { locale: Locale; productId: string },

              };
              unpublish: (product: Product) => Promise<boolean>;

              variations: {
                  addVariationOption: (
                      productVariationId: any,
                      __namedParameters: { value: string },
                  ) => Promise<ProductVariation>;

                      __namedParameters: {
                          _id?: string;
                          key?: string;
                          options: string[];
                          productId: string;
                          tags?: string[];
                          type?: string;
                      } & TimestampFields & { locale?: string; title?: string },
                  ) => Promise<ProductVariation>;

                          productVariationId: string,

                  update: (
                      productVariationId: string,

              };

                          productVariationId: string,
                          texts: Omit<
                              ProductVariationText,
                              "productVariationId"
                              | "productVariationOptionValue",
                          >[],
                          productVariationOptionValue?: string,
                      ) => Promise<ProductVariationText[]>;
                  };
                  update: (
                      productVariationId: string,
                      doc: ProductVariation,
                  ) => Promise<ProductVariation>;
              };
          },
      >

      • Defined in core-products/src/module/configureProductsModule.ts:106
